/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are somewhat muted, adding a sense of tranquility to the otherwise busy setting.
